column143: AOC has been awarded to 5 parties for different items from the item list. All AOC has been uploaded as one pdf.
column157: 5 bidders qualified through technical bid submitted BOQs. It was noted 232 items had met 3 bidders, whereas remaining items did not have requisite bidders. As such CS is being made for the 232 items, and for the remaining items re-tender is planned.
column174: Bids of all the 5 bidders have been checked and verified by the tender committee and found to be in order. All five bidders have been found to qualify technically and admitted for further processing.
